00020     public function init(){
00021         $this->_enum = isset($_POST[FOConfigEnums::$CHAMP_FORM_ENUM])?$_POST[FOConfigEnums::$CHAMP_FORM_ENUM]:"";
00022         $this->_modifiedElement = isset($_POST[FOConfigEnums::$CHAMP_FORM_MODIFIED_ELEMENT])?$_POST[FOConfigEnums::$CHAMP_FORM_MODIFIED_ELEMENT]:"";
00023         $this->_tomodifyElement = isset($_POST[FOConfigEnums::$CHAMP_FORM_TOMODIFY_ELEMENT])?$_POST[FOConfigEnums::$CHAMP_FORM_TOMODIFY_ELEMENT]:"";
00024                 $this->_newElement = isset($_POST[FOConfigEnums::$CHAMP_FORM_NEW_ELEMENT])?$_POST[FOConfigEnums::$CHAMP_FORM_NEW_ELEMENT]:"";
00025                 $this->_todeleteElement = isset($_POST[FOConfigEnums::$CHAMP_FORM_TODELETE_ELEMENT])?$_POST[FOConfigEnums::$CHAMP_FORM_TODELETE_ELEMENT]:"";
00026                 $this->_action = isset($_POST['action'])?$_POST['action']:"";

00030     public function isValid(){
00031                 if (($this->_action == "Ajouter") and ($this->_newElement == "")) 
00032                         $this->setErrorMessage("Champ d'ajout vide, action impossible");
00033                 if (($this->_action == "Modifier") and ($this->_modifiedElement == "") and ($this->_tomodifyElement == "")) 
00034                         $this->setErrorMessage("Champ de modification vide, action impossible");
00035                 if (($this->_action == "Supprimer") and ($this->_todeleteElement == ""))
00036                         $this->setErrorMessage("Aucun élément à supprimer");
00037                 return $this->getErrorMessage()=="";
00038                                         
00039     }
00040     
00041     public function process(){
00042         if ($this->_action == "Ajouter"){
00043                 $liste = DBConfig::getConfigValue($this->_enum);
00044                 $liste = $liste.";;".$this->_newElement;
00045                 DBConfig::updateRecord($this->_enum,$liste);
00046         }
00047         if ($this->_action == "Modifier"){
00048                 $liste = DBConfig::getEnumeration($this->_enum,false);
00049                 $tab=array();
00050                         foreach ($liste as $objet){
00051                                 if ($this->_tomodifyElement!=$objet->getFormSelectOptionValue())
00052                                         $tab[count($tab)]=$objet->getFormSelectOptionValue();
00053                                 else $tab[count($tab)]=$this->_modifiedElement;
00054                         }
00055                         $chaine = implode($tab,";;");
00056                         DBConfig::updateRecord($this->_enum,$chaine);   
00057         }
00058         if ($this->_action == "Supprimer"){
00059                         $liste = DBConfig::getEnumeration($this->_enum,false);
00060                         $tab=array();
00061                         foreach ($liste as $objet){
00062                         if ($this->_todeleteElement!=$objet->getFormSelectOptionValue())
00063                                 $tab[count($tab)]=$objet->getFormSelectOptionValue();
00064                         }
00065                         $chaine = implode($tab,";;");
00066                         DBConfig::updateRecord($this->_enum,$chaine);   
00067         }
00068         header("Location: configEnumerations.php?".FOConfigEnums::$CHAMP_FORM_ENUM."=".$this->_enum);
00069     }
00070 }
